name: Advanced Game Academy - Ding Dong Deliver
name_original: Advanced Game Academy - Ding Dong Deliver
description:
Play as food delivery personnel and make sure the nearby citizens can get the food they ordered. Watch out for the robots out to get your food and ruin your day and your customer’s day. Use your EMP (Edible Munitions Pulse) to keep them at bay or defeat them entirely.

How to Play/Controls: 

  • WASD- Movement
  • Q + E-Attacks
  • Z-Reset Position

Use the bulletin boards to gain missions, deliver food while protecting it from robots, and get to the ending with your hard-earned cash. Use the red pad at the beginning of the area to heal yourself periodically.

Credits (name/role):

Zachary Elkin: Building/Enemy Modeler

Nolan Grandell: Programming, Level Design, Final Build

Ethan Chevalier: Programming, Game Design

Ness Gagliardi: Lead artist

Adam Donnelly: Game Design, Sound, Game Concept

Anthony Garuffi: Modelling

Zachary Ritter: Artist, Music, Game Concept
